instructions.name: accept_authority
docs: Transfer authority to new address (2-step process for security)
Step 2: New authority accepts transfer

docs: Market USDC vault

accounts.name: market_usdc_vault
docs: Market USDC vault

instructions.name: resolve_market_by_authority
docs: Emergency resolution by protocol authority
Can only be called if oracle fails to resolve within 24 hours

accounts.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority - only they can perform emergency resolution

instructions.name: transfer_authority
docs: Transfer authority to new address (2-step process for security)
Step 1: Current authority initiates transfer

errors.name: BettingEnded
errors.msg: Betting has ended for this market

errors.name: TooEarlyToResolve
errors.msg: Cannot resolve market before resolution time

errors.name: OracleTimeoutNotReached
errors.msg: Oracle timeout not reached - wait 24 hours before authority can resolve

errors.name: NoWinningBets
errors.msg: No bets placed on winning side

errors.name: NeedsRefund
errors.msg: Market needs refund - only one side has bets

errors.name: WrongCurrencyType
errors.msg: Wrong currency type for this market

errors.name: InvalidUsdcMint
errors.msg: Invalid USDC mint - must use official USDC mint

types.name: AuthorityTransferInitiated
docs: Emitted when authority transfer is initiated

types.name: AuthorityTransferred
docs: Emitted when authority transfer is completed

types.name: BetPlaced
docs: Emitted when a bet is placed

types.name: FeesDistributed
docs: Emitted when fees are distributed

types.name: MarketCreated
docs: Emitted when a new market is created

types.name: MarketNeedsRefund
docs: Emitted when market needs refund (only one side had bets)

types.name: MarketResolved
docs: Emitted when market is resolved

types.name: MarketStats
docs: Market statistics for frontend display

types.name: OracleFeeUpdated
docs: Emitted when oracle fee is updated

types.name: OracleRemovedFromWhitelist
docs: Emitted when an oracle is removed from whitelist

types.name: OracleWhitelisted
docs: Emitted when an oracle is whitelisted

types.name: ProtocolInitialized
docs: Emitted when a new protocol is initialized

types.name: ProtocolPaused
docs: Emitted when protocol is paused

types.name: ProtocolStats
docs: Protocol statistics for frontend display

types.name: ProtocolUnpaused
docs: Emitted when protocol is unpaused

types.name: UserPositionStats
docs: User position details for frontend display

types.name: WinningsClaimed
docs: Emitted when winnings are claimed
